text.en: Queen of the hosts of wisdom ḍākinīs of the three abodes,
text.en-trans: né sum yeshe daki tsok kyi jé

text.en: My only mother, Khandro Yeshe Tsogyal,
text.en-trans: ma chik khandro yeshe tsogyal la

text.en: To you I pray: never leave me, but look on me with compassion.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so dralmé tukjé zik

text.en: Grant your blessings, so my mind and your wisdom may merge inseparably.
text.en-trans: tuk yi yermé drepar jingyi lob
